  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'admin' COMMENT 'ID of the user who created this record',
  CHANGE COLUMN last_updated_by last_updated_by VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'admin' COMMENT 'ID of the user who created or last updated this record';

--
-- Alter table "migration_users_list"
--
ALTER TABLE migration_users_list
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL;

--
-- Alter table "notification_filter_values"
--
ALTER TABLE notification_filter_values
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Audit field which contains the details of a user creating the record',
  CHANGE COLUMN last_updated_by last_updated_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Audit field which contains the details of a user who last updated the record',
  ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC;

--
-- Alter table "patient_loyalty_card"
--
ALTER TABLE patient_loyalty_card
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Who created this record?',
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Who last updated this record?';

--
-- Alter table "patient_loyalty_card_preference"
--
ALTER TABLE patient_loyalty_card_preference
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Who created this record?',
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Who last updated this record?';

--
-- Alter table "patient_payment_method"
--
ALTER TABLE patient_payment_method
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Who created this record?',
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Who last updated this record?';

--
-- Alter table "prescription_transaction_history"
--
ALTER TABLE prescription_transaction_history
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'updated by',
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'created by';

--
-- Alter table "program_communication_history"
--
ALTER TABLE program_communication_history
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL;

--
-- Alter table "push_notification_devices"
--
ALTER TABLE push_notification_devices
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the user who created this record',
  CHANGE COLUMN last_updated_by last_updated_by VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the user who created or last updated this record',
  ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC;

--

--

  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Who created this record',
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'By whom this record was last updated',
  ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC;

  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'By whom this record was last updated',
  ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC;

-- Alter table "role_links"
--
ALTER TABLE role_links
  CHANGE COLUMN created_by created_by INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the user who created this record',
  CHANGE COLUMN updated_by updated_by INT(11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the user who created or last updated this record';

ALTER TABLE store_communications

  CHANGE COLUMN last_updated_by last_updated_by VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL;
